Title: Article 2
Text:

Title: Article 3
Text: Dubbed the Magnificent Seven stocks, Apple, Microsoft, Google parent Alphabet, Amazon, Nvidia, Meta Platforms and Tesla lived up to their name in 2023 with big gains. But the start of the third quarter of 2024 showed a big divergence of returns.
